buildCommand: . $HOME/.cargo/env && cargo install trunk wasm-bindgen-cli && cd dashboard && trunk build --release --public-url /
installCommand: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y && . $HOME/.cargo/env && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
ignoreCommand: git diff --quiet HEAD^ HEAD -- dashboard/ shim/ crates/ wit/ vercel.json Cargo.toml
